title: Mesh projection surface is not flat/square
description: The 3D projection mesh applies rotation distortion (rotateX: 10°, rotateY: -2°, rotateZ: 4° at lines 64-66) making the text surface appear non-orthogonal. Verify: (1) Whether perspective transform should be applied only to glow/bloom, (2) If base text mesh needs flat geometry, (3) Current transform matrix calculation in render pipeline

title: Not all PixiJS layers using native rendering path
description: Investigate whether text, glow, and LCD effect layers are properly configured for optimal rendering. Check: (1) Layer render target setup (Canvas vs DOM rendering paths), (2) Whether mask/filter layers use native DRP where possible, (3) Resolution multiplier impact on native rendering (line 72: resolutionMult: 0.25)

title: LCD effect not displaying
description: The LCD effect is enabled in params (lcdEnabled: true at line 75) but not visually showing on render. Check: (1) LCD rendering pipeline in PixiJS, (2) Whether LCD filter/shader is applied to text container, (3) Dead pixels effect interaction (line 76)
